timeline.bodyText:
EXTREMELY MINOR nit:
convert"s"/translate"s" vs identify/interpret
timeline.author: raphkim

replies.bodyText:
Update: we talked offline and weren't positive which verb tense was correct. To document our finding here, Oracle says:

Use 3rd person (descriptive) not 2nd person (prescriptive). The description is in 3rd person declarative rather than 2nd person imperative.
replies.author: jamesonwilliams
